00013 namespace LCM {
00014 
00015 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
00016 VanGenuchtenSaturation<EvalT, Traits>::
00017 VanGenuchtenSaturation(Teuchos::ParameterList& p) :
00018   vgSaturation(p.get<std::string>("Van Genuchten Saturation Name"),
00019      p.get<Teuchos::RCP<PHX::DataLayout> >("QP Scalar Data Layout"))
00020 {
00021   Teuchos::ParameterList* elmd_list = 
00022     p.get<Teuchos::ParameterList*>("Parameter List");
00023 
00024   Teuchos::RCP<PHX::DataLayout> vector_dl =
00025     p.get< Teuchos::RCP<PHX::DataLayout> >("QP Vector Data Layout");
00026   std::vector<PHX::DataLayout::size_type> dims;
00027   vector_dl->dimensions(dims);
00028   numQPs  = dims[1];
00029   numDims = dims[2];
00030 
00031   Teuchos::RCP<ParamLib> paramLib = 
00032     p.get< Teuchos::RCP<ParamLib> >("Parameter Library", Teuchos::null);
00033 
00034   std::string type = elmd_list->get("Van Genuchten Saturation Type", "Constant");
00035   if (type == "Constant") {
00036     is_constant = true;
00037     constant_value = elmd_list->get("Value", 1.0); // default value=1, identical to Terzaghi stress
00038 
00039     // Add Van Genuchten Saturation as a Sacado-ized parameter
00040     new Sacado::ParameterRegistration<EvalT, SPL_Traits>(
00041   "Van Genuchten Saturation", this, paramLib);
00042   }
00043   else if (type == "Truncated KL Expansion") {
00044     is_constant = false;
00045     PHX::MDField<MeshScalarT,Cell,QuadPoint,Dim>
00046       fx(p.get<std::string>("QP Coordinate Vector Name"), vector_dl);
00047     coordVec = fx;
00048     this->addDependentField(coordVec);
00049 
00050     exp_rf_kl = 
00051       Teuchos::rcp(new Stokhos::KL::ExponentialRandomField<MeshScalarT>(*elmd_list));
00052     int num_KL = exp_rf_kl->stochasticDimension();
00053 
00054     // Add KL random variables as Sacado-ized parameters
00055     rv.resize(num_KL);
00056     for (int i=0; i<num_KL; i++) {
00057       std::string ss = Albany::strint("Van Genuchten Saturation KL Random Variable",i);
00058       new Sacado::ParameterRegistration<EvalT, SPL_Traits>(ss, this, paramLib);
00059       rv[i] = elmd_list->get(ss, 0.0);
00060     }
00061   }
00062   else {
00063     TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(true, Teuchos::Exceptions::InvalidParameter,
00064            "Invalid Van Genuchten Saturation type " << type);
00065   } 
00066 
00067   // Optional dependence on Temperature (E = E_ + dEdT * T)
00068   // Switched ON by sending Temperature field in p
00069 
00070   if ( p.isType<std::string>("Porosity Name") ) {
00071     Teuchos::RCP<PHX::DataLayout> scalar_dl =
00072       p.get< Teuchos::RCP<PHX::DataLayout> >("QP Scalar Data Layout");
00073     PHX::MDField<ScalarT,Cell,QuadPoint>
00074       tp(p.get<std::string>("Porosity Name"), scalar_dl);
00075     porosity = tp;
00076     this->addDependentField(porosity);
00077     isPoroElastic = true;
00078 
00079   }
00080   else {
00081     isPoroElastic = false;
00082 
00083   }
00084 
00085   if ( p.isType<std::string>("QP Pore Pressure Name") ) {
00086          Teuchos::RCP<PHX::DataLayout> scalar_dl =
00087            p.get< Teuchos::RCP<PHX::DataLayout> >("QP Scalar Data Layout");
00088          PHX::MDField<ScalarT,Cell,QuadPoint>
00089            ppn(p.get<std::string>("QP Pore Pressure Name"), scalar_dl);
00090          porePressure = ppn;
00091          isPoroElastic = true;
00092          this->addDependentField(porePressure);
00093 
00094          // typically bulk modulus of solid grain is larger than
00095          // bulk modulus of solid skeleton.
00096 
00097          waterUnitWeight = elmd_list->get("Water Unit Weight Value", 9810.0);
00098                     new Sacado::ParameterRegistration<EvalT, SPL_Traits>(
00099           "Water Unit Weight Value", this, paramLib);
00100   }
00101 
00102   this->addEvaluatedField(vgSaturation);
00103   this->setName("Van Genuchten Saturation"+PHX::TypeString<EvalT>::value);
00104 }
00105 
00106 // **********************************************************************
00107 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
00108 void VanGenuchtenSaturation<EvalT, Traits>::
00109 postRegistrationSetup(typename Traits::SetupData d,
00110                       PHX::FieldManager<Traits>& fm)
00111 {
00112   this->utils.setFieldData(vgSaturation,fm);
00113   if (!is_constant) this->utils.setFieldData(coordVec,fm);
00114   if (isPoroElastic) this->utils.setFieldData(porosity,fm);
00115   if (isPoroElastic) this->utils.setFieldData(porePressure,fm);
00116 }
00117 
00118 // **********************************************************************
00119 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
00120 void VanGenuchtenSaturation<EvalT, Traits>::
00121 evaluateFields(typename Traits::EvalData workset)
00122 {
00123 
00124   ScalarT tempTerm;
00125   std::size_t numCells = workset.numCells;
00126 
00127   if (is_constant) {
00128     for (std::size_t cell=0; cell < numCells; ++cell) {
00129       for (std::size_t qp=0; qp < numQPs; ++qp) {
00130         vgSaturation(cell,qp) = constant_value;
00131       }
00132     }
00133   }
00134   else {
00135     for (std::size_t cell=0; cell < numCells; ++cell) {
00136       for (std::size_t qp=0; qp < numQPs; ++qp) {
00137   Teuchos::Array<MeshScalarT> point(numDims);
00138   for (std::size_t i=0; i<numDims; i++)
00139     point[i] = Sacado::ScalarValue<MeshScalarT>::eval(coordVec(cell,qp,i));
00140       vgSaturation(cell,qp) = exp_rf_kl->evaluate(point, rv);
00141       }
00142     }
00143   }
00144   if (isPoroElastic) {
00145     for (std::size_t cell=0; cell < numCells; ++cell) {
00146       for (std::size_t qp=0; qp < numQPs; ++qp) {
00147         // van Genuchten equation
00148         vgSaturation(cell,qp) = 0.084 + 0.916
00149                  /std::pow((1.0 + 7.0*porePressure(cell,qp)/waterUnitWeight),2.0);
00150 
00151 
00152       }
00153     }
00154   }
00155 }
00156 
00157 // **********************************************************************
00158 template<typename EvalT,typename Traits>
00159 typename VanGenuchtenSaturation<EvalT,Traits>::ScalarT&
00160 VanGenuchtenSaturation<EvalT,Traits>::getValue(const std::string &n)
00161 {
00162   if (n == "Van Genuchten Saturation")
00163     return constant_value;
00164   else if (n == "Water Unit Weight Value")
00165       return waterUnitWeight;
00166   for (int i=0; i<rv.size(); i++) {
00167     if (n == Albany::strint("Van Genuchten Saturation KL Random Variable",i))
00168       return rv[i];
00169   }
00170   TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(true, Teuchos::Exceptions::InvalidParameter,
00171          std::endl <<
00172          "Error! Logic error in getting parameter " << n
00173          << " in VanGenuchtenSaturation::getValue()" << std::endl);
00174   return constant_value;
00175 }
